backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing paintings, user profiles, authorization, ratings, and blob storage with CRUD methods and access checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authentication-aware layout, profile gating, and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/draw/ColorPalett: Color picker component with preset swatches and custom color input for the drawing tools.
frontend/src/components/draw/DrawingCanv: HTML5 canvas component providing drawing tools, undo history, and PNG export logic.
frontend/src/components/draw/ToolBar.tsx: UI toolbar for selecting drawing tools, adjusting size and opacity, and triggering undo.
frontend/src/components/gallery/Painting: Displays a painting with image, title, date, share button, and rating info, and handles click navigation.
Renders a responsive masonry-like grid of PaintingCard components with navigation on click.
Loads and displays a painting image using its direct URL.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with app logo navigation and logout handling that clears identity and cache.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for entering and saving a user name during profile setup with validation and loading state.
frontend/src/components/ratings/RatingCo: Star-based rating widget allowing users to rate a painting and view their current rating.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareButto: Share button that uses Web Share API or copies the painting link to clipboard.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useComplete: Mutation hook to submit a completed painting and refresh the gallery cache.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerProf: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useGallery.ts: Hooks to fetch the full gallery and retrieve a specific painting from cached results.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useRatings.ts: Hooks for fetching painting ratings, computing user and average ratings, and submitting new ratings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor instance based on identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStatus.ts: Reads actor initialization status from cache without refetching to report readiness or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides current user identity info and utility to check ownership by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, stored identity restoration, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light/dark modes, and utility classes for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays a welcome/signâ€‘in screen or authenticated dashboard with navigation to drawing and gallery pages.
frontend/src/pages/DrawPage.tsx: Provides a drawing interface with tools, color controls, and save functionality, ensuring authentication and backend actor readiness.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery of paintings fetched from the backend, handling loading states and requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PaintingDetailPage.ts: Displays a single painting with metadata, ratings, and sharing options, redirecting unauthenticated users and handling missing data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented ICP dapp features, versions, and current scaffold capabilities.
